fmsia.optin.screen.title: FancyMenu System Interactions Addon Opt-In Screen
fmsia.optin.screen.text.headline: FancyMenu System Interactions Addon
fmsia.optin.screen.text.body:
Your modpack contains the System Interactions Addon for FancyMenu!
This addon helps modpack creators to make complex menus,
but it can also be used for malicious actions on your system.
If this modpack is from a trusted author, you don't need to worry about anything,
but if this is a modpack from a relatively unknown author,
make sure it is save before you continue.

You can §cdisable§r the addon below, but this could also
make some menus §cnot §cwork §ccorrectly§r anymore!

Do you want to enable or disable the addon now?
fmsia.actions.renamefile.desc.value: File/Folder Path + New File/Folder Name [Separated by ';']
fmsia.actions.runcmd.desc:
Executes a CMD/Terminal command.
Supports OS-specific commands.
